duties_responsibilities.duty: Define, land, and execute strategic priorities for the sales operations team, including annual business planning, territory optimization, and pipeline analysis.
Partner with cross-functional teams and act as the subject matter expert for key issues such as quoting, pricing, and deal approvals.
Lead projects for territory optimization, product transitions, new sales programs, etc.
Manage territory and quota process for headcount changes and ensure quota coverage and governance.
Manage the forecast and reporting process for the geo/regions/districts supported and participate in weekly forecast calls with sales management.
Build reports and dashboards to track key metrics and KPIs, and monitor pipeline quality to ensure rep participation.
Prepare for and participate in quarterly business review with sales management.
